name: 25 Years of Defense
description:
A game for the FZ Game Jam 2021.

I kinda forgot about it so I rushed to make this. It actually didnt turn out half bad.

Should have been upgrades for the units and more enemies.

Click a unit or select them with the keys 1, 2 or 3.

Then press left or right side of the tower to release the unit that way.

Made in Godot.
